mapper.insert: INSERT INTO scores (user_id, paper_id, total_score_obtained, max_score, completion_time, status, answered_count, total_count) VALUES (#{userId}, #{paperId}, #{totalScore}, #{maxScore}, #{createTime}, #{status}, #{answeredCount}, #{totalCount})
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, paper_id, total_score_obtained, max_score, completion_time, status, answered_count, total_count FROM scores ORDER BY completion_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE scores SET user_id = #{userId}, paper_id = #{paperId}, total_score_obtained = #{totalScore}, max_score = #{maxScore}, status = #{status}, answered_count = #{answeredCount}, total_count = #{totalCount} WHERE id = #{id}
